responses: Good to see you again, how do you do?
Hi there, how can I help?
Sorry, I did not understand you.
Please provide me with more information.

patterns: What can you do for me?
responses: I can try to motivate you.
I have a bunch of motivational quotes I can tell you if you want to.
You are upset? I will motivate you!

patterns: I would like you to give me a quote
Can you give a quote please?
Okay, I am ready for a quote
responses: Learn as if you will live forever, live like you will die tomorrow. - Mahatma Gandhi
It is better to fail in originality than to succeed in imitation. - Herman Melville
The pessimist sees difficulty in every opportunity. The optimist sees opportunity in every difficulty. - Winston S. Churchill
When we strive to become better than we are, everything around us becomes better too. - Paulo Coelho
The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity. - Amelia Earhart
That is why I am here for!
It was nice chatting with you!
